scripts.dev:docker: yarn build && docker-compose -f generated/docker/docker-compose.yml up dev
scripts.build: tsc && docker-compose -f docker/compose_fragments/network.yml -f docker/compose_fragments/version.yml -f docker/docker-compose.yml --project-directory . config > generated/docker/docker-compose.yml
scripts.start:docker: yarn build && docker-compose -f generated/docker/docker-compose.yml up prod
